Caption: Figure 1: When displaying all calls made between nodes A and B, we have to zoom both A and B
Figure 2: Recursive matrix subdivision according to relative component size (a), Matrix subdivision according to number of subcomponents at a speciﬁc abstrac- tion level (b)
Figure 3: Identical matrix cells at different levels of visual abstrac- tion
Figure 4: Series of frames showing the transition from the cell in ﬁgure 2b to the cell in ﬁgure 3

Figure 6: Matrix representation versus node-link diagrams: callmatrix of entire system (a), force directed layout of entire system (b) and layered layout of subsystem in ﬁgure 3 (c)
